/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/alt-text */ /* eslint-disable react/no-unescaped-entities */ import React from 'react'; import { HorizontalCard, Button } from 'reactify'; import './horizontal-card.scss'; import { borderedColoredCode, customClassCode, customSizeCode, disabledCode, simpleCode, } from './code-refrence'; import DemoCard from '../../components/demo-card'; const HorizontalCardDemo = () => (
Avenger's Endgame
Adrift in space with no food or water, Tony Stark sends a message to Pepper Potts as his oxygen supply starts to dwindle.

); export default HorizontalCardDemo;
